TopicTitle: HMV Plays KSP! New series for 1.2: PreRelease!

Articles.Content:
NEW SERIES! Lazy Grand Tour!

In my newest series, I'll be doing a Grand Tour. But only AFTER I've fully colonized the entire system (Except Eve. I mean come on.) and have at least one refueling outpost in each planet's SOI.

KSP Fundamentals is still on hiatus.

Old Series:

  • Bases (Also Season 2), the original series. Bugs and grind ended this one after over 100 episodes
  • Kerpollo, where I do an Apollo-Style mission to each landable world in the game.
  • Teamwork, where people built ships for me to fly.
  • Quest For Snacks, where I tried out life support.
  • Bases 0.90, where I tried to recreate my first series.
  • Contractor, where I tried many different contracts.
  • KSP New Horizons is not strictly cancelled, but no promises.
  • Anomaly Surveyor, where I visit each Easter Egg in the game using a Contract Configurator pack.
  • KSP 1.2 PreRelease, where I just had some fun doing a quick career, testing all the new stuff in 1.2.
Edited October 20, 2016 by 5thHorseman

Mods I use for Lazy Grand Tour

  • Blizzy's Toolbar
  • All Y'All
  • Ambient Light Adjustment
  • Better Burn Time
  • Configurable Containers
  • Distant Object Enhancement
  • Editor Extensions Redux
  • Environmental Visual Enhancements
  • Kerbal Engineer Redux
  • HyperEdit
  • Automated Science Sampler
  • Kerbal Space Transport System
  • PreciseNode
  • RCS Build Aid
  • Simple Construction (With the 1.2 updated dll from Extraplanetary Launchpads)
  • Simple Life (I dropped this because it didn't work in 1.2.1 and I decided I don't like Life Support very much in general)
  • Stock Visual Enhancements (Though I replaced the city map with my own personal map from EVE)
  • Kerbal Alarm Clock
  • WarpEverywhere
  • Waypoint Manager
  • Simple Logistics
  • Maneuver Node Evolved

Edited January 15, 2017 by 5thHorseman

Here's the "big list of names" for the current series, Lazy Grand Tour. Whenever I need a new Kerbal (or one is born, if that ever happens) I'll just take the first name on this list, editing the gender and profession of the Kerbal to fit. If you requested a profession and I don't need that profession, I'll skip your name until I need your preferred profession.

If you do NOT see your name here and you asked, you may want to ask again (though give me a day or two to get to it).

Edited December 29, 2016 by 5thHorseman

How I do it:

I use 2 pieces of software: OBS to record video and audio, and VideoPad to edit it together.

I start KSP from the command line using the switch -popupwindow (and with "full screen" UNCHECKED in settings) to run it in a full screen window, and once it's all loaded and I'm where I want to start recording, I hit F10 (Not the default, but I set it up that way) to start recording OBS. It's open on a 2nd monitor so I can see it's recording. I then do my let's play, hitting F10 to stop and start recording as necessary. I almost never forget to restart recording

When all done, I load all the video snippets into VideoPad and chop out the stuff I don't want, do some trickery with subtitles to name the episode and put little asides in where I want them, slap in my intro and whatnot, and then create the final episode which eventually gets uploaded to YouTube.

It's a lot easier than the way I used to do it with FRAPS and Audacity. I do sacrifice the ability to handle the levels of audio in post, but it's well worth the time savings.

Edited October 20, 2016 by 5thHorseman
